name: 003 Black Planes - Glitched Landscapes Collection A 003
description:
#003
1200x1200px

Reworked monochrome version of 002.
Number 3 out of 100 landscapes that I will release for this collection.
In these pieces I mix various techniques I learned over the years in photoshop. I enjoy mixing different scales of pixels and adding storytelling to my art.

Painted and animated in Photoshop.

Artwork by Virgil Loth
https://twitter.com/virgill_artz
